GSD.description:
drm/virtio: Check whether transferred 2D BO is shmem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 36e133af33ea54193378b190cf92c47c12a43d34. For more details please see the references link.
